SEARCH
Package com.group11.game

Class Characters

java.lang.Object
com.group11.game.Characters
Direct Known Subclasses:
Raccoons, Squirrels
public abstract class Characters extends Object
Abstract character class representing the moving entities (squirrel and raccoon) in the game. This class includes general settings for the moving entities, such as position, speed, and sprites.
